channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose grating on Ironbridge end of bridge, 15th October
item.description:
The grating on footbridge recently been replaced, end panel becoming loose and lifts when walk on it, at the Twigworth Green estate end of bridge, bridge across the road from end of bridleway which comes off end of Brook Lane. Been gradually getting worse last 2 weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ironbridge Road, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Both lights over Sidney Street council car park do not work, 15th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9a, Hewlett Place, Fairview, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 170, High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Drains completely blocked., 15th October
item.description:
There are three drains on Gravel Walk. One near the property “Byways” and two at the bottom on Gravel Walk close to Southam Lane next to properties “Wheelgates” and “ Dalboyne”. All are completely blocked with debris and need clearing before the wet weather starts. These have been reported before, but closed without any resolution. Please contact the parish councillor reporting these defects to discuss before closing,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Walk, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light by juniper court has been off for a while now., 15th October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Kempton Grove, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham

item.category: Flytipping (not witnessed and no evidence likely)

item.title: Road has been repaired to a very poor standard, better than the first attempt but still not suitable for the speed of the road, 15th October
item.description:
How is it difficult to repair a section to a good standard, it not suitable for the speed of the road, if weather was bad at night and someone doesn't know the road is uneven it could casue an accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: We have a tree outside the front of the house that looks increasingly vulnerable, leaning toward the house and very top heavy It is on public land and would appreciate if someone could come have a look to judge what to do with it Many thanks, 15th October
item.description:
The tree is located on the path on the road outside the houses 62 and 64 welland lodge road, Gl52 3HQ

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Starvehall Farm Footpath, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering under the car, 15th October
item.description:
This man decided to finish his can of rebull and then decided to open his door and fling thw can under his car and then close the door, before deciding to roll a cigeret.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Missing street name by No22, 15th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandstar Close, Longlevens, Gloucester
